name: Project Kaos
description:
This game is in VERY early access, you will likely encounter bugs and unfinished/unpolished features. It may or may not be updated further but if it ever reached a final state the description would be as below.

In this thrilling virtual reality game, you play as a spaceman tasked with defending a space station from waves of drones and robots. As you take on these formidable foes, you'll need to use all of your skills and quick reflexes to avoid their attacks and keep the space station intact. With immersive gameplay and a variety of challenging enemies to face, this VR game will keep you on the edge of your seat as you battle for survival in the depths of outer space. 

The game features wave-based gameplay, with increasingly difficult waves of drones and robots coming at you as you progress. Whether you're fending off drones that explode on impact or taking on terrifying robots armed with powerful weapons, every moment in this game is filled with heart-pounding action. So put on your VR headset and get ready to defend your space station from the ultimate alien threat!
